meanings.sent1: She arrived latish to the party.
meanings.sent2: He finished his homework latish, but it was still on time.
meanings.sent3: The rabbit hopped latish to the garden, missing the early morning dew.
meanings.sent4: The sun set latish, casting a warm glow over the horizon.
meanings.sent5: The latish arrival of the bus caused a bit of confusion among the passengers.

meanings.definition: Occurring or done after the usual or expected time.
meanings.sent1: The latish train caused her to be late for work.
meanings.sent2: The latish delivery of the package was unexpected.
meanings.sent3: The latish blooming of the flowers surprised the gardeners.
meanings.sent4: His latish response to the email made her anxious.
meanings.sent5: The latish arrival of winter brought unexpected snowfall.
